author: モンすば
text:
マリオギャラクシーはど世代好きな作品やからるしあにも是非好きになって貰いたいね〜
ちょっとしたアドバイスになるかもだけどアクション（走り幅跳び、しゃがみジャンプなど）とかルール（敵を踏めばコイン、殴ればスターピースみたいなの）を覚えられればもっと楽しめそうやね〜
あとポインターはこのゲームで絶対に必要だからプロコンじゃなくて1回ジョイコンでやるのもいいかもな〜
るしあのやりやすい方でいいと思うけどジョイコンの方が多分ポインター合わせるの相当楽やから1回試してみるのもいいかもね
世界観とかBGMを楽しんでちょ

author: Nexcell Pride
text:
Yes!!! One of the most greatest streamings ever... And with a premiering game.
Started with that pretty BGM and with Rushia in green form. :_るんるん::_ちょうちょ:
"Super Mario 3D Collection", a collection with 3 titles... Rushia-hime chooses "Galaxy" and brought many visions... The galactic scenarios and her green form are like a great combination ever :_ちょうちょ:

Also, Rushia was seen too happy enjoying the new gaming experience.
Obviously deserves a part deux, part trois... Many parts, sequels, spin-offs, etc...

Many laughters are present in this stream.

Highly recommended... For players who played in original releases, a new experience, meanwhile it's a good starting for the first time newcomers.

And... Supacha Yomi Time was shortened for some reason.

Anyway, tanoshikatta :_ハート: :_きゅん:
